version_description:
- New layout and experience, with all the information you need for each hotel, like restaurants and parking
- Support for Touch ID to log in
- Use the widgets to quickly access your upcoming bookings
- Add your bookings to your calendar
- Support for Force touch to quickly access latest searches from the home screen
- Bug Fixes
- Performance improvements

Thank you for the feedback given so far: we are working to make the app meet your needs and today we are happy to say that we are releasing the following features:
- Search hotels directly on the map
- Create a new Premier Inn account
- Amend your personal account
- Improvements and bug fixes for the “My Bookings” section
- Other bug fixes and improvements

- Search hotels directly on the map
- Create a new Premier Inn account
- Amend your personal account
- Improvements and bug fixes for the “My Bookings” section
- Other bug fixes and improvements

- Create a new Premier Inn account
- Amend your personal account

Whether it's an important business trip or a special occasion (or just because!) you can now book our shiny new Premier Plus rooms directly through the app which offer:

• More comfort: workspace (with chair and lamp), comfy armchair, a walk-in rainfall shower with luxury toiletries!
• More convenience: Mini-fridge with free water, coffee machine, treats and ironing equipment!
• More connectivity: Ultimate Wi-Fi!

Bug fixes

- All of the great benefits (plus more) of using our Premier Inn app can now be had on an iPad! We have released an optimised-for-tablet version:
    - Easy-to-read list of hotels and specific hotel information overlaid on a map view so you can find the best hotel that suits you!
    - Clear descriptions of meal options with a gallery of the restaurant and food options
    - View/amend bookings across the tablet, mobile device and desktop website
- Download your reservation to your Apple Wallet to view offline
- Bug fixes

    - Clear descriptions of meal options with a gallery of the restaurant and food options
    - View/amend bookings across the tablet, mobile device and desktop website

- Download your reservation to your Apple Wallet to view offline
- Bug fixes

- Customers booking accessible rooms are now able to select the type of bathroom they need and whether they prefer a double or a twin room. Search your rooms as usual and once you select your rate, you can further select your needs
- bug fixes and performance improvements

○ We've refreshed the hotel details page, with more information from TripAdvisor and an updated maps component
○ You can now add ultimate WiFi to your booking
○ We've added more information on hotel accessibility and images of accessible bathrooms
○ Fixed a bug where the title options were not displaying correctly for additional rooms
○ Fixed a bug where the add/remove infant buttons were not displayed correctly

- When you add your booking to Apple Wallet, you can now find much more information about your stay
- We have fixed a bug causing the app to crash when booking for iOS 9 users
- We have ensured that ultimate WiFi is not being sold to users who have chosen business or premier plus rooms

We listened to your feedback and we are happy to announce that we re now able to support  Business Booker accounts. Log-in, import your booking and book a room for yourself with your business rate. The app is your perfect companion for your business trips

We are happy to announce that we now support the German language in the app! Simply ensure your device is in Deutsch and the app will automatically change language.
Rest easy!
